title: Soulkiss
description: It all started with a dream. He was handsome , sexy and had a body to die for. He swept Arianna off of her feet with his charm and made her feel loved, cherished and protected. Only one problem He wasn’t real This man, this oh so perfect man didn’t exist, he was but a figment of Arianna’s over active imagination, a culmination of her day dreams and deepest fantasies. Or was he… A double date soon turns to disaster, starting a chain of events that’s thrusts Arianna into a world so different from her own, testing her courage, her heart and her soul. But is she strong enough to battle through and save the soul destined for her.
author: J.  Thompson
